Avatar representing Believer #2688, a Devotee of Momo.

    // READ ME - Important Notice about variable Attributes //
    
    [Equipped]
    Purchasing a Spirit Key Avatar does *NOT* grant you any of the accompanying “Equipped” attributes.
    Attributes marked “Equipped”, and their underlying Relic NFT are *NOT* transferred or sold together with a Spirit Key Avatar.
    The attribute is removed when either the underlying Relic NFT or underlying Spirit Key Avatar is transferred or sold.
    
    [CUSTOM]
    Attributes marked [CUSTOM] can be changed by the holder.
    
    [FIXED]
    Attributes marked “FIXED” cannot be changed by the holder, and are randomly assigned at reveal.
